name: jaoi2
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: sylbi(wo(w0, w1), w2, wo(w0, wa(wn(w0), w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wo(w0, w1), w2)
-| wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, wa(wn(w0), w1)))
-| wi(wo(w0, wa(wn(w0), w1)), w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wo(w0, w1), w2)
-| wb(wo(w0, w1), wo(w0, wa(wn(w0), w1)))
-| wi(wo(w0, wa(wn(w0), w1)), w2)

|- wi(wo(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(wo(w0, wa(wn(w0), w1)), w2)

comment: Inference removing a negated conjunct in a disjunction of an antecedent if this conjunct is part of the disjunction. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 3-Nov-2017.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 21-Sep-2018.)
